MultiFeature.Name: Crossbow Expert
MultiFeature.Text: Thanks to extensive practice with the crossbow, you gain the following benefits: • You ignore the loading quality of crossbows with which you are proficient. • Being within 5 feet o f a hostile creature doesn’t impose disadvantage on your ranged attack rolls. • When you use the Attack action and attack with a onehanded weapon, you can use a bonus action to attack with a loaded hand crossbow you are holding.
